author: wtopstaff
title: Spurs-Hawks, Box
text:
By The Associated Press October 14, 2015 10:43 pm SAN ANTONIO (86) 
Leonard 6-16 7-8 20, Duncan 2-3 0-2 4, Bonner 0-1 0-0 0, Parker 1-5 6-6 8, Green 1-3 1-1 3, Ginobili 4-5 0-0 10, Mills 3-5 0-0 6, West 1-7 0-0 2, Butler 0-6 0-0 0, Anderson 1-5 2-2 4, Thomas 2-6 4-4 8, Marjanovic 1-3 0-0 2, Williams 1-3 0-0 3, Fredette 2-6 0-0 4, McCallum 1-4 1-2 3, Ndoye 1-2 6-9 8, Simmons 0-0 1-2 1, Sykes 0-2 0-0 0. Totals 27-82 28-36 86. ATLANTA (100) 
Bazemore 1-5 2-2 4, Millsap 6-9 0-0 13, Horford 2-5 2-2 7, Teague 5-8 7-7 19, Korver 4-9 2-2 13, Hardaway Jr. 3-8 0-0 7, Splitter 0-1 3-4 3, Scott 1-4 0-0 2, Schroder 3-5 2-2 10, Sefolosha 2-4 0-0 5, Holiday 0-5 3-4 3, Tavares 2-6 3-4 7, Mack 1-5 0-0 2, Patterson 0-1 0-0 0, Barron 1-2 0-0 2, Petteway 0-0 0-0 0, Jones 1-1 1-2 3.
